quote: Obstacles are the cost of greatness.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Action is the real measure of intelligence.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: How bad do you want it?
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: Blood, sweat and respect. First two you give. Last one you earn.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: All the power is within you. You can do anything.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Show the world how much you’ll fight for the winners circle.
author: Pat Riley

quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: It’s not about excuses. You got a job to do there and do it. Find a way to be effective and not make excuses but just man up and play.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Learn to be comfortable in the uncomfortable. Learn to be peaceful, not bored. Learn to be inspired, not scared.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: What you want exists. Don’t settle until you get it.
author: Jay Shetty

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot. Make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
author: Conan O’Brien

quote: What’s the tiniest step you can take? Do that first.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: I can’t believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: I want the world to be better because I was here.
author: Will Smith

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: There are four basic human needs; food, sleep, sex and revenge.
author: Banksy

quote: Motivation is a fire from within. If someone else tries to light that fire under you, chances are it will burn very briefly.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Deep down you know what you want. Deep down you have what it takes.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: I wasn’t there to compete. I was there to win.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: To seek greatness is the only righteous vengeance.
author: Criss Jami

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Man is what he believes.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: A great man is hard on himself; a small man is hard on others.
author: Confucius

quote: If you perform the sacrifice of doing your duty, you do not have to do anything else. Devoted to duty, man attains perfection.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: A person can achieve everything by being simple and humble.
author: The Vedas

quote: The most persevering becomes the most talented.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: To have become a deeper man is the privilege of those who have suffered.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You will earn the respect of all men if you begin by earning the respect of yourself.
author: Musonius Rufus

quote: When you find peace within yourself, you also find peace without.
author: Naga Devi

quote: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The inner fire is the most important thing mankind possesses.
author: Edith Sodergran

quote: What you aim at determines what you see.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: A wise man becomes free when he is ready to die at any moment.
author: Diogenes

quote: The ignorant work for their own profit; the wise work for the welfare of the world, without thought for themselves.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Once you’re calm and fit, you have everything worth having, as the rest just comes and goes.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Progress is made in solitude; profit is made in public.
author: Sven Schnieders

quote: You should think in such a way that everybody could look into your soul and see what is transpiring there.
author: Seneca

quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man’s character, give him power.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The wiser you get, the less you care to look like a fool.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: There is nothing with which every man is so afraid as getting to know how enormously much he is capable of doing and becoming.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: Do not waste time on things you cannot change or influence.
author: Robert Greene

quote: We need men who can dream of things that never were.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: My idea of the modern stoic sage is someone who transforms fear into prudence, pain into information, mistakes into initiation, and desire into undertaking.
author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quote: Conversation enriches the understanding, but solitude is the school of genius.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: You don’t succeed by being perfect. You succeed by doing good work, consistently.
author: Thibaut

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Plutarch

quote: Riches have shut off many a man from the attainment of wisdom.
author: Seneca

quote: Too many prefer gentle lies to hard truths.
author: Shane Parrish

quote: The ideals which have always shone before me and filled me with joy are goodness, beauty, and truth.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Truth hurts but what hurts makes you stronger.
author: Maxime Lagacé

quote: Nothing in this world is harder than speaking the truth, nothing easier than flattery.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Discovering the truth about ourselves is a lifetime’s work, but it’s worth the effort.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: In the long run, the most unpleasant truth is a safer companion than a pleasant falsehood.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Only silence communicates the truth as it is.
author: Osho

quote: The further a society drifts from the truth, the more it will hate those that speak it.
author: George Orwell

quote: The things that we decide to run from are the truth. When you make excuses, you’re running from the truth.
author: David Goggins

quote: In order to be effective truth must penetrate like an arrow – and that is likely to hurt.
author: Wei Wu Wei

quote: The only way to tell the truth is to speak it with kindness. Only the words of a loving man can be heard.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If you wish to see the truth, then hold no opinion for or against.
author: Osho

quote: If you’re seeking the truth then what you don’t know is more important than what you know.
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: I tore myself away from the safe comfort of certainties through my love for the truth; and truth rewarded me.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: The truth may be out there, but the lies are inside your head.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: The presence of those seeking the truth is infinitely to be preferred to the presence of those who think they’ve found it.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Telling the truth and making someone cry is better than telling a lie to make someone laugh.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: I speak the truth, not so much as I would, but as much as I dare; and I dare a little more as I grow older.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The path that leads to truth is littered with the bodies of the ignorant.
author: Miyamoto Musashi

quote: There is nothing more necessary than truth, in comparison with it, everything else has only secondary value.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Those who have failed to work toward the truth have missed the purpose of living.
author: Buddha

quote: If you cannot find the truth right where you are, where else do you expect to find it?
author: Dogen

quote: The truth is like a lion; you don’t have to defend it. Let it loose; it will defend itself.
author: Augustine of Hippo

quote: Truth: something hard to say and hard to hide.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Truth is the best disinfectant.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: If you tell the truth, you don’t have to remember anything.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Tomorrow is often the busiest day of the week.
author: Spanish proverb

quote: When I was a kid my parents moved a lot, but I always found them.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Rice is great when you’re hungry and you want 2000 of something.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: I remixed a remix, it was back to normal.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: The best way to teach your kids about taxes is by eating 30 percent of their ice cream.
author: Bill Murray

quote: I’m writing a book. I’ve got the page numbers done.
author: Steven Wright

quote: A lot of people are afraid of heights. Not me, I’m afraid of widths.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I have always wanted to be somebody, but I see now I should have been more specific.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Don’t be so humble – you are not that great.
author: Golda Meir

quote: I was trying to daydream, but my mind kept wandering.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I like Kit-Kat, unless I’m with four or more people.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: It’s okay if you don’t like me. Not everyone has good taste.
I live on a one-way street that’s also a dead end. I’m not sure how I got there.
author: Steven Wright

quote: People are like music. Some speak the truth, and others are just noise.
author: Bill Murray

quote: Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile.
author: Billy Sunday

quote: Never trust people who smile constantly. They’re either selling something or not very bright.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: I did not attend his funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: Everything is changing. People are taking the comedians seriously and the politicians as a joke.
author: Will Rogers

quote: When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye.
author: Cathy Guisewite

quote: That’s why they call it the American Dream, because you have to be asleep to believe it.
author: George Carlin

quote: I don’t understand why people would want to get rid of pigeons. They don’t bother no one.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.
author: Fred Allen

quote: If you’re too open-minded; your brains will fall out.
author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

quote: If you think nobody cares about you, try missing a couple of payments.
author: Steven Wright
